ygData.subject: Re: Isn't this a monk mailing list?
ygData.msgSnippet: Making money is a good thing at lower levels but I wouldnt go out of my way to try to make any. Once you get up in level Money really becomes valuless. (sp?)
ygData.messageBody:
Making money is a good thing at lower levels but I wouldnt go out of my way
to try to make any. Once you get up in level Money really becomes valuless.
(sp?) if you have a way to make cash use it to get the items you need or
want, but cash in the bank gets old. most of the really good items are
never sold only traded for. when was the last time you saw someone auctiona
FBSS or a Ykesha etc. if you just adventure and look foir the items you want
they will eventually show up. or you may just get somthing better than you
wanted in the 1st place.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 38th level
Da'Kor Guild
E-marr Server


----- Original Message -----
From: Scott Hueseman <shueseman@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 1:58 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Isn't this a monk mailing list?


> From: "Scott Hueseman" <shueseman@...>
>
> >
> >From: "Imari J. A. Dellimore" <ijad@...>
> >
> >
> >P.S. 500p is a reasonable amount to have SAVED up by level 18, but making
> >500p IN ONE DAY at level 19 is amazing, he may not wnat to give away his
> >secret, but what ever he is doing to make that kind of money I would like
> >to know...
>
>
> Well, 500pp in ONE day isn't so hard. Get lucky on a few rare spawns or
> good loots (Runed Bone Fork, Chitin Shell tunic, etc), head to auction and
> let the bidding commence. 500pp EVERY day at level 19 would be amazing!
> Of course then you get into rapid devaluation of platinum, mass
> unemployment, famine, disease, pottery sketch fraud, etc., etc.
>
> Dornn
>
> >
